## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description          | Type     | Default                  |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------- | -------- | ------------------------ |
| `color`  | `color`   | Color of the spinner | `string` | `'var(--c-primary-600)'` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the spinner  | `number` | `24`                     |
